title: About - Last Week in AI
content: Weekly summaries of AI news, straight to your inbox! Plus occasional articles, interviews, and more. Run by a couple of graduate students as a hobby, so don’t worry about marketing or the like. Skynet Today is dedicated to providing accessible and informed coverage of the latest AI news and trends. We offer a platform for  people with expertise in AI to share their knowledge and perspectives  with a broader audience.  Share Last Week in AI
